title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide a tax credit to employers for employee catastrophic health care costs and to health insurance companies for insurer catastrophic health care costs, and for other purposes.
content: Keep America Competitive Tax Credit Act of 2006 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow certain employers and health insurance issuers a tax credit for up to 50 of employee catastrophic health care costs .
